item.title: Set Role...

prompt.label: This specific role:
prompt.value: select granted_role as role from user_role_privs union select a.role from role_role_privs a where nvl(:2, 'N') = 'N' start with a.role in (select b.granted_role from user_role_privs b) connect by prior a.granted_role = a.role order by role

prompt.label: Default role(s):
prompt.default: select listagg('"' || granted_role || '"', chr(10) || ' , ') within group (order by granted_role) from user_role_privs where default_role = 'YES'

prompt.label: All except the following:
prompt.default: select listagg('"' || granted_role || '"', chr(10) || ' , ') within group (order by granted_role) from user_role_privs
